TopicTitle: Camera Suddenly Becomes Extremely Sensitive to the User

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: 7950X3D | GPU: 7900XTX | RAM: 64GB DDR5 6000

 

After playing the game for a relatively brief period of time the camera suddenly becomes extremely sensitive to the user. This is usually triggered by tabbing out of the game briefly, or after reverting to a launch pad. While in this mode you are un able to move your camera in a useful manner, with the mouse wheel going from each extreme view with a single click.

A restart fixes the issue, however going to the VAB or KSC does not.

It does potentially seem to be craft related as some craft are more susceptible than others, I've included one such vehicle that gets it quickly for comparison.
